questions.questionTitle: Why does the woman call the man?
anwers: To complain about a lost package
To check on a broken package
To ask about a late package

questions.questionTitle: What does the man say about the package?
anwers: It is still on the loading platform.

questions.questionTitle: What does the man plan to do?
anwers: Bring the package to the woman
Determine the status of the package

script:
� Hello, UPS? I'm calling to check on a package I sent on the 7th. It still hasn't arrived, and today's the 13th. Can you tell me what happened to it?
� I'll certainly try ma'm. Do you have the tracking number handy?
� Let's see... it's T-714-2009-05-07.
� OK, I can see that it did go out on the 7th. Hold on, please. I've got to check another computer and see where it's at.
